1903580.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1903580
In-book reference  : Book 49, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 49, Hadith 001
1903580.text: Abu Sa'id al-Khudri said: "He (Allah bless him and give him peace) was more bashful than the virgin in her boudoir, and when he disapproved of something, we knew it from the expression on his face.”

1903590.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1903590
In-book reference  : Book 49, Hadith 002
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 49, Hadith 002
1903590.text: 'A’isha said: “I never looked at the private parts of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace).” (Or she said: “I never saw the private parts of Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace).”
